title: Jordan Klepper | Don Jr.’s Coup Texts Revealed; Tucker Carlson Promotes Testicle Tanning: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at text messages revealing more high-ranking Republicans involved in Donald Trump’s attempt to overturn the 2020 election, including his son Donald Trump Jr.

Then, Jordan Klepper talks about becoming a father at the start of the COVID pandemic, engaging with Trump supporters at his events and what happens when they recognize him.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
